text: I am new to HubSpot, took the academy course, and now have been tasked with making some changes.  I have been able to make all needed changes with the exception of items within a module.  Two modules have similar information, containing product details, and I need to remove one from each.  I have not been able to locate where this information resides ... not hardcoded in module.  I could use some assistance/direction in locating the information.  Thank you

Hi,
can anyone help me out, in "social-follow global" module there is icon field.
it has some icons set already but when we choose "custom icon" option and find/select "tiktok" icon it will not generate the icon like others. If anyone have any idea so pls share
